text: Ryszard Ronczewski (27 June 1930 – 17 October 2020) was a Polish actor. He appeared in more than seventy movies from 1954 until 2013. He was best known for his roles in The Two Who Stole the Moon, Colonel Wolodyjowski and An Ancient Tale: When the Sun Was a God. Ronczewski was born in present-day Vilnius, Lithuania. Ronczewski died on 17 October 2020 from COVID-19 in Sopot, Poland at the age of 90.Sopot.
